channel.title: CVE Feed for hiddenpearls -- Analytify – Google Analytics Dashboard For WordPress (GA4 analytics made easy)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hiddenpearls -- Analytify – Google Analytics Dashboard For WordPress (GA4 analytics made easy)

item.title: CVE-2024-1809|2024-05-02T16:52:16.449Z -- hiddenpearls -- Analytify – Google Analytics Dashboard For WordPress (GA4 analytics made easy)
item.description: The Analytify – Google Analytics Dashboard For WordPress (GA4 analytics made easy) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on AJAX functions in combination with nonce leakage in all versions up to, and including, 5.2.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and higher, to obtain certain sensitive information related to plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-1584|2024-05-02T16:51:55.037Z -- hiddenpearls -- Analytify – Google Analytics Dashboard For WordPress (GA4 analytics made easy)
item.description: The Analytify – Google Analytics Dashboard For WordPress (GA4 analytics made easy) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'wpa_check_authentication' function in all versions up to, and including, 5.2.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify the site's Google Analytics tracking ID.
